name: Smash It Enhanced
description:
Smash It Enhanced is an Action Hack And Slay Cookie Clicker

Be the hero. Get more and more powerful and collect coins and beat dragons. Everyone loves coins and dragons!

Features:

★ Monsters and Items
★ Skills
★ Magic Spells
★ Easy Controls
★ Achievements
★ DLCs
★ Level System
★ Fast Pace Action
★ No Story
